name: PCXCogs
author: PhasecoreX (PhasecoreX#0635)
description: My cogs focus on automation, where the bot will automatically respond or perform actions when needed, even if commands are not used. There's also other stuff thrown in there for fun.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing my repo!
For more information on my cogs, or to report any bugs/suggestions, go to my GitHub here: <https://github.com/PhasecoreX/PCXCogs>.
You can also find me in the Red Cog Support Discord server, or in my own PCXSupport Discord server here: https://discord.gg/QzdPp2b
